newsitem.title: USA: Citation Computer in marketing pact.
newsitem.headline: Citation Computer in marketing pact.

text.p: Citation Computer Systems Inc said Wednesday that it formed a strategic alliance and signed a marketing agreement with DataView Imaging International Inc.
Under the agreement, both companies will retain their identities in the healthcare marketplace.
DataView Imaging will continue to sell its telemedicine and imaging solutions. Citation will integrate DataView's imaging capabilities into its clinical solution offerings.
The companies said the combined product offerings will give healthcare providers access to treatment data wherever they see patients.

"Our strategic alliance with DataView Imaging International will help our customers provice better patient care by making available critical patient treatment data -- including clinical images like x-rays -- at the locations where the clinicians and physicians need access," J. Robert Copper, chairman, said in a statement.
